uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.stepHandlers
Class ScalarStorageHandler

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.StorageHandler
      uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.stepHandlers.ScalarStorageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
StepHandler
public class ScalarStorageHandler
extends StorageHandler

Standard storage handler for scalar parameters of the simulation. The values are stored white space separated in an ASCII file

  • t: the simulation time
  • Mx: the average magnetization in x direction
  • My: the average magnetization in y direction
  • Mz: the average magnetization in z direction
  • |M|: the average norm of the magnetization
  • dM_max: the maximum derivation of the magnetization at the last step

Author:
Claas Abert
